price: Itu adalah ayat-ayat dari Allah, Kami bacakan kepadamu dengan hak (benar) dan sesungguhnya kamu benar-benar salah seorang di antara nabi-nabi yang diutus.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wa-innaka lamina al-mur'salīna
